extends Options
    Options for a pivot.

    • Field Detail

      • backgroundColor

        @Option
public String backgroundColor
        The background color or fill of the pivot. Defaults to black.

      • borderColor

        @Option
public String borderColor
        The border or stroke color of the pivot. In able to change this, the borderWidth must also be set to something other than the default 0. Defaults to silver.

      • borderWidth

        @Option
public Integer borderWidth
        The border or stroke width of the pivot. Defaults to 0.

      • radius

        @Option
public Integer radius
        The pixel radius of the pivot. Defaults to 5.

      • PivotOptions

        public PivotOptions()
